description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure 1 A Self-Propelled Scissor Lift and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Trenton.
full_summary:
================
### Self-Propelled Scissor Lift Tender
=====================================

### Canadian Government Tender Invitation
--------------------------------=====

**Reference:** PW-22-01013977

### Solicitation Information
------------------------

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Self-Propelled Scissor Lift |
| Solicitation Number | W8476-236657 |
| Publication Date | November 18, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 13, 2022, 14:00:00 |

### Contract Details
-----------------

* Contract Category: Supplies and Services
* Contract Description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires 1 A Self-Propelled Scissor Lift and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Trenton.
* Contract Duration: January 5, 2023, to September 1, 2023.
* Delivery Schedule: Deliverables are required between March 1, 2023, to April 1, 2023.

### Conditions of Participation
-----------------------------

Suppliers interested in participating in this tender must submit their proposals by the tender closing date.

### Supply Chain Considerations
-----------------------------

This tender is available under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

*Please note* All conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation should be inquired with the contracting authority, Kyle Grundy, by email at kyle.grundy@forces.gc.ca.

### Support Materials
------------------

Refer to the attached Solicitation Document for complete tender details: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/ca54ceceeb9710c69e60dfbff8895794/w8476-236657_rfp_bt322.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/ca54ceceeb9710c69e60dfbff8895794/w8476-236657_rfp
